description: Classy and modern watch face.Perfect timekeeper for all connoisseurs!Features:- 3 watch faces with different patterns,- ambient mode.Designed for Android Wear.Supported smartwatches: LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Motorola Moto 360, Sony SmartWatch 3, Asus ZenWatch, Samsung Gear Live.
descriptionHTML:
Classy and modern watch face.
Perfect timekeeper for all connoisseurs!

Features:
- 3 watch faces with different patterns,
- ambient mode.

Designed for Android Wear.
Supported smartwatches: LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Motorola Moto 360, Sony SmartWatch 3, Asus ZenWatch, Samsung Gear Live.
